sentence: rotate the right purple block by 30 degrees and align it with the left side of the foremost red block
pick up the red block in the front center and place it on the purple block next to it
attach the middle red block to the left side of the first purple block you moved
bring the red block you have not moved yet and place it to the right side of the front purple block
align the front yellow block to the left end of the red blocks
